name: Performapal Rain Goat
text: During either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated that would inflict damage to you: You can discard this card; make that effect damage to you 0. During either player's Main Phase: You can discard this card, then target 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-Eyes" card you control; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
